…fantastic career.            Congratulating Dominique Claseman and Ahren Jurgensen

Mrs. FISCHBACH. Mr. Speaker, I rise to congratulate Dominique  Claseman and Ahren Jurgensen of Olivia, Minnesota, on raising nearly  $120,000 for a veterans memorial in their hometown.

Mr. Speaker, 3 years ago, Dominique raised over $77,000 to construct  a memorial for veterans.…
